org.qualitune.naoservice.client
Class Nao.ALFileManager

java.lang.Object
  org.qualitune.naoservice.client.Nao.ALFileManager
Enclosing class:
Nao
public static final class Nao.ALFileManager
extends java.lang.Object

ALFileManager manages the user files stored in a shared folder.

public org.json.JSONObject getFileCompletePath(java.lang.String prefs)
